title: Another Potential Covid-19 Lab Leak Clue
sub_head: Investigating the pandemic’s origin is still worth the effort.
body:
The world may never learn the origin of the novel coronavirus, but intriguing information keeps materializing even in the pandemic’s third year. A pair of scientists from Hungary may have stumbled into more evidence supporting the theory that Covid-19 emerged from a laboratory.
A paper posted recently suggests that genetic data from soil samples sent to a Chinese firm for sequencing could have been contaminated by an ancestor of the Covid-19 virus. The Wuhan Institute of Virology (WIV), where some scientists believe the pandemic likely began, has used the same firm.
